ISSUE.TITLE: Searching keyword finds more than I expected at Templates menu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Searching keyword finds more than I expected at Templates menu ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: 9.2.0 * AWX install method: docker on linux * Ansible version: 2.9.3 * Operating System: Centos7 * Web Browser: Chrome ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1. Create Job Templates with name prefix N_CAT01_ , R_CAT01_ and T_CAT01_ serveral kinds. 2. Repeat 1. with changing prefix number 01 to 02, 10, 11. 3. Search with keyword T_CAT10 (or T_CAT11) 4. Results have N_CAT10_xxx (or N_CAT11_xxx) ##### EXPECTED RESULTS Do not find templates which doesn't have keyword in name ##### ACTUAL RESULTS One or two job templates not related with keyword was found. ##### ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ![T_CAT10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25745571/77148646-4b2b6400-6ad3-11ea-987a-6c4a92e30ce5.png) ![T_CAT11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25745571/77148650-4c5c9100-6ad3-11ea-90eb-de62446c7049.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix incorrect workflow approval job details (#6357)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix credentials search in adhoc prompt modal (#6359)
